content.content: Hello all, back again with another round of updates! Please test out the new theme and share any feedback so it can be incorporated into this initial update for our forum’s updated styling. I’ve attached some screens here for easy access, but you can follow these steps to get the full experience:   create an account at theme-creator.discourse.org   https://theme-creator.discourse.org/u/{your-user-name}/themes to install the theme “From a github repo”:   https://github.com/scottrepreneur/makerdao-discourse-theme   Sample Screens Latest Posts  Screen Shot 2020-01-19 at 10.25.11 PM1160×716 86.1 KB  Category List  Screen Shot 2020-01-19 at 11.21.27 PM1157×692 59.1 KB  New Topic Dialog  Screen Shot 2020-01-19 at 11.21.57 PM1256×724 54.2 KB  Single Thread  Screen Shot 2020-01-19 at 11.22.50 PM1147×684 68 KB  Quote Reply  Screen Shot 2020-01-19 at 11.38.44 PM1143×650 68 KB  Completed Poll  Screen Shot 2020-01-19 at 11.36.15 PM1145×708 46.8 KB  Search  Screen Shot 2020-01-19 at 11.40.48 PM1037×680 78.4 KB  Let me know if you have any concerns or trouble testing the theme in the replies or on RocketChat. Thanks!
Nice, I made dark mode mad:   Screen Shot 2020-01-22 at 12.39.33 PM776×116 9.36 KB
@twblack88 Looking great! Still too dark i think, would be nice to have a middle dark color. I will try this out tonight and will provide feedback

@MakerMan @jernejml @NikKunkel @Mariano_Conti @Haiku @cyrus @hexonaut @Planet_X @Mitote @mrabino1 Would love any feedback you all might have here. We’re looking to collect any feedback before we implement this style for the forum. Thanks!

@ginworkflow @kwadrax @Kathleen_Chu @Adam_Skrodzki @psychonaut @Sirlupinwatson1 Would love any feedback you all might have here. We’re looking to collect any feedback before we implement this style for the forum. Thanks!

Hi @scottrepreneur, I did install it , i took Facebook UI , since it was looking pretty good and easy to use. I don’t hate it, i pretty like it actually and the tutoriel could be better. What i mean is for new coming user change their theme. Must be hard for them and to make things easier, we could manage to make the post a little better and do a better tutorial on how to install themes properly. Good work and good post, i think MakerDAO need some changes and colors. Thanks to include me in the feedback, much appreciate.

Here’s the Maker Dark Theme screenshots Any feedback is much appreciated. Thread list  Screen Shot 2020-02-19 at 3.41.01 PM2526×1286 330 KB  New Thread  Screen Shot 2020-02-19 at 3.42.07 PM2620×1326 365 KB  Replies/Quotes  Screen Shot 2020-02-19 at 4.10.23 PM1150×681 84.9 KB  Polls  Screen Shot 2020-02-21 at 3.30.39 PM2452×1362 313 KB  Category List  Screen Shot 2020-02-19 at 4.09.08 PM1172×688 85.1 KB  Individual Thread  Screen Shot 2020-02-19 at 3.48.25 PM1243×826 175 KB  Search  Screen Shot 2020-02-19 at 3.46.25 PM1245×658 77.7 KB  User Summary  Screen Shot 2020-02-19 at 3.47.32 PM1237×872 61.8 KB  Footer  Screen Shot 2020-02-19 at 3.47.03 PM1254×661 66.5 KB
